item.description:
I made a meetup at Buffalo Wild Wings to see UFC. Some people aren't into UFC fights, so instead i'm making this a seperate event for those who want to go out Saturday night to a club / bars.

With the original place to meet up, Downtown At The Taft, is shut down the new spot will be at Black Bear. It's no cover to get in so it's the perfect place to gather up and find out where we are going to go. BAR is really calling my name though. We'll be meeting up inside  near the door at Black Bear.

Christian.

(860) 357-7264
item.how_to_find_us: Call me (860) 357-7264, I'll text everybody when i am on my way and when i'm there.
item.name: New Haven Night Out
